class.name: SGArea3D
class.brief_description: 3D area for detection of other areas and physics bodies.
class.description: 3D area that can detect overlapping [SGCollisionObject3D]s or other [SGArea3D]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_area_collisions
method.description: Returns a list of [SGAreaCollision3D]s for the overlapping areas.

method.name: get_overlapping_area_count
method.description: Returns the number of overlapping areas. If you only need the count, this method is somewhat faster than counting the elements in the array returned by [method get_overlapping_areas].

method.name: get_overlapping_areas
method.description: Returns a list of overlapping [SGArea3D]s or [RID]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_bodies
method.description: Returns a list of overlapping [SGStaticBody3D]s, [SGKinematicBody3D]s or [RID]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_body_collisions
method.description: Returns a list of [SGAreaCollision3D]s for the overlapping [SGStaticBody3D]s and [SGKinematicBody3D]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_body_count
method.description: Returns the number of overlapping bodies. If you only need the count, this method is somewhat faster than counting the elements in the array returned by [method get_overlapping_bodies].
